Package ohos.agp.components

Class Component.EstimateSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.Component.EstimateSpec
  • Enclosing class:
    Component

    public static class Component.EstimateSpec
extends Object
    Defines the measure specifications of a component.

    A EstimateSpec encapsulates the arrangement requirements that a child component inherits from the parent. Each EstimateSpec indicates the requirement for either the width or height as well as a mode. There are three possible modes for EstimateSpec: UNCONSTRAINT, PRECISE, and NOT_EXCEED.

    Since:
    5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ESTIMATED_STATE_BIT_MASK
      Bits of state for esimated size
      static int NOT_EXCEED
      In this mode, the maximum size has been specified for the child.
      static int PRECISE
      In this mode, the parent has determined the exact size of the child.
      static int UNCONSTRAINT
      In this mode, the parent has no constraint on the child, meaning that the child can be whatever size it wants.

        public static final int NOT_EXCEED
        In this mode, the maximum size has been specified for the child. The child cannot exceed the specified size.

    • Method Detail

      • getSizeWithMode

        public static int getSizeWithMode​(int size,
                                  int mode)
        Creates a measure specification based on the specified size and mode.
        Parameters:
        size - Indicates the width or height contained in the measure specification.
        mode - Indicates the mode contained in the measure specification. The value must be UNCONSTRAINT, PRECISE, or NOT_EXCEED.
        Returns:
        Returns the size with a mode.
        Since:
        5

      • getMode

        public static int getMode​(int estimateSpec)
        Obtains the showing mode of this component.
        Parameters:
        estimateSpec - Indicates the estimate specification.
        Returns:
        Returns the showing mode of this component.
        Since:
        5

      • getSize

        public static int getSize​(int estimateSpec)
        Extracts the size from the provided estimate specification.
        Parameters:
        estimateSpec - Indicates the measure specification.
        Returns:
        Returns the size of the measure specification.
        Since:
        5

      • getChildSizeWithMode

        public static int getChildSizeWithMode​(int size,
                                       int esimatedConfig,
                                       int childEstimatedConfig)
        Creates a measure specification for the child component based on the specified size and mode.
        Parameters:
        size - Indicates how big the child component wants to be.
        esimatedConfig - Indicates the mode of the parent.
        childEstimatedConfig - Indicates the mode of the child component.
        Returns:
        Returns the size with a mode for the child component.
        Since:
        5
